sentences.sentence: All applicants should be at least 16 years of age at the commencement of this course.
sentences.translation: 所有申请人在本课程开始时应至少年满16岁。

sentences.sentence: The protracted nature of the commencement speech did not sit well with the restless group of recent graduates.
sentences.translation: 毕业典礼演讲的时间太长，让这群焦躁不安的应届毕业生很不舒服。

sentences.sentence: President Bush gave the commencement address today at the University of Notre Dame.
sentences.translation: 布什总统今天在巴黎圣母院大学发表了毕业典礼演说。
